datapack.soul_fire_d.enchantments.descri: Burn your enemies with Soul Fire Aspect and Soul Flame!
enchantment.minecraft.soul_fire_aspect.d: Causes additional soul fire damage when used to attack a mob.
enchantment.minecraft.soul_flame.desc: Arrows fired from the bow will deal additional soul fire damage.
soul_fire_d_dynamic_campfire_tags: Marks campfires with the correct tag
soul_fire_d_dynamic_fire_source_tags: Marks fire sources with the correct tag
